author: Storrie Morrow
review: My partner and I have lived here for almost 2 years now, and I couldn't have imagined a better place for us to land. The complex has a lot of amenities. I love the sense of community I've felt here. My neighbors and the staff are so

author: Luke Rose
review: Latisha and her staff were absolutely wonderful the year I lived here. They have strict rules in place which Makes for a wonderful experience both inside and outside of the apartments. They were very attentive to any fixing needs, usually

author: John Currier
review: I lived here for 5 years after I got divorced.  It was a great home.  The staff was always wonderful to deal with, and 7 years later they're all still there.  The recent remodel looks wonderful and they make a genuine effort to make

author: Kate Schultehenrich
review: My partner, brother, and I called this complex to gather more information for a 2 bed/1 bath unit as we are planning to move to Washington in the next few months. We were in the process of being put on the wait list when they asked "Will it

author: Ai Leen
review: The community is okay, amenities are average BUT the manager is RUDE & OBNOXIOUS! She is very condescending, arrogant & really really rude. Walls are thin so be prepared to hear your neighbor snore & other things that happens at night that should be private between couples.

author: Dr Brenda Kotewa
review: The staff here is responsive, friendly, and compassionate. They consider their renters part of their family and plan events accordingly. No discrimination here based on ability, ethnicity, religious beliefs, or gender diversity. Been here five years and no plans to move from this awesome location.

author: Ellie R.
review: The apartment itself is cheaply made and the walls are so thin so you can hear your neighbors even if they are having a normal conversation. The manager and maintenance team are great, though.
